name: Shield Spec
desc:
Replaces Special Attack with Vanguard Strike and enhances its power.
Each additional enemy hit by Vanguard Strike grants 2 extra Photon Energy, up to 10.
Successfully Block prevents losing the stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases Max HP by 2%, up to 10 stacks, with each instance of DMG removing 1 stack. It lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. Gaining stacks resets the duration.

name: Resolved to Return
desc: Each time 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier is consumed or deducted, reduces the remaining CD of Radiance by 1 second.

name: Bold Fearless
desc:
When Sacred Blade or Judgment deals DMG, there is a fixed 25% chance to cause Vanguard Strike to evolve into Vanguard Hunt.
Vanguard Hunt: Deals Attack Damage equal to 240% ATK to the target, restores 2% of your max HP, and gains Indomitable Courage.
Indomitable Courage: Increases Haste by 3% for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.

name: Divine Circle Chant
desc: The recovery rate of Holy Sigils from Haste +100%.

name: Holy Radiance
desc:
When Sacred Blade hits an enemy target, it applies a Holy Mark to the target.
Vanguard Strike can spread this Holy Mark to hit enemy targets.

name: Conquest Pursuit
desc: While Zeal Crusade is active, Vanguard Strike evolves into Vanguard Hunt.

name: Adversity Enhancement
desc: Special Attack and damaging Expertise are enhanced based on missing HP. For every 1% HP lost, increases their DMG by 1%.

name: Holy Strike
desc: Each time 1 layer of Lightforged Barrier is consumed or deducted, 10% chance to obtain 1 Holy Sigil.

name: Holy Barrier
desc: After casting the Ultimate, leaves a Holy Barrier that blocks damage for friendly targets within the area. The Holy Barrier disappears after taking total damage equal to 200% of the caster's Max HP or after 15s.

name: Lightforged Drive
desc: When Casting Radiance, it automatically releases Judgment to up to 5 nearby enemy targets.

name: Lightforged Balance
desc:
When your HP percentage is higher than your target's, DMG taken from that target -5%.
When your HP percentage is lower than your target's, Judgment deals 50% more DMG.

name: Zeal Haste
desc: For every 15 points of Photon Energy consumed, the remaining CD of Zeal Crusade -1 second.

name: Radiant Core
desc:
Vanguard Hunt can grant Radiant Core.
Repeatedly gaining Radiant Core reduces its 2s window.

name: Divine Circle Resonance
desc: For each enemy inside Divine Circle, increases Divine Circle DMG by 25% and Divine Circle Healing by 5% (caps at 10 enemies).

name: Overflow Healwall
desc: When your accumulated overhealing reaches 10% of your Max HP, gains 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier.

name: Divine Guard
desc: When in the Divine Circle, reduces all DMG taken by 10%.

name: Sigil Pursuit
desc: DMG dealt by Vanguard Hunt and Sacred Blade to targets with Holy Sigil increases by 20%.

name: Judgment Improvement
desc: For each 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier you possess, Judgment gains 2% bonus healing.

name: Ascension of the Lightforged Barrier
desc:
Maximum Light Energy +20.
When you have at least 5 stacks of Lightforged Barrier, the Judgment consumes 5 less Light Energy.

name: Light Healing
desc: While having Radiant Shield, gains 12% healing bonus.

name: Judgment of All Beings
desc: When Judgment hits only 1 enemy target, its damage +25%.

name: Ruthless Rewind
desc: During the duration of Zeal Crusade, each time 1 Holy Sigil is consumed, it overdrives Zeal Crusade by 1 layer. When the Overdrive reaches 3 layers, Zeal Crusade bursts outward, dealing 200% ATK Attack Damage and is guaranteed to critically hit.

name: Wide Raid
desc: Increases Zeal Crusade range by 100%. While Zeal Crusade is active, the effect of Indomitable Courage is doubled.

name: Divine Circle Blessing
desc: While within the Divine Circle, your Healing Receive effect +10%.

name: Determination Slash
desc: When Lightforged Barrier has fewer than 5 stacks, taking DMG no longer reduces its stacks. When Lightforged Barrier has 5 or more stacks, taking DMG has a 50% fixed chance not to reduce its stacks.

name: Light Protection
desc: While having Radiant Shield, gain 5% Lightal Bonus.

name: Decisive Blade
desc: After Radiant Core explosion, Sacred Blade DMG +100% for 20s. Stacks up to 3 charges, casting Sacred Blade consumes one charge.

name: Holy Sigil Enhancement
desc: When Judgment deals DMG, the target takes double DMG from Holy Sigil for the next 5s.
